content.class: bg-slate-100 rounded p-1 flex flex-col gap-10 p-10

content.text: In the majority of the countries, working people had a free day only during holidays, and on these days people celebrated something very religious.
content.name: abcd

content.text: Did you know that some countries and cultures established holidays for diferent reasons? For example we have historical holidays, religious holidays. In many countries we have holidays like Thanksgiving, Independence day, Presidents' Day, Christmas, etc.
content.name: efgh

content.text: Last holiday, I watched the fireworks on the 4th of July, and we celebrated Independence Day.
content.name: mnop

content.text: Two years ago, I attended the parade for thanksgiving with my family in New York, it was beautiful and I enjoyed the amazing balloons.
content.name: uvwx

content.text: Last Christmas, I visited my grandparents and we listened to old Christmas carols with their friends.
content.name: cdef

content.text: One month ago my parents decided to do wild camping during President's Day and we stayed for 3 days in the wonderful forest.
content.name: klmn

content.text: During our wild camping, my dad and I went fishing and enjoyed spending time together.
content.name: stuv

content.text: Yesterday it was Chinese New Year and I visited my grandparents and we watched the festivals in their neighborhood.
content.name: ABCD

content.text:
Did you see the activities during the holidays?
Is there something similar in your country?
content.name: IJKL
PT:YxOn
